page.title: 03Trade
page.content: Spar Shop, Middleham. July 19th 1985. 1.5 litres Lemonade 42p. 1 lb. Granny Smiths apples 40p. 1 lb. English apples 30p. 1 lb. Carrots 18p. 6 Bread buns 46p. Toothbrush 42p. 1.5 Kg. Plain flour 39p. 1 lb Ground rice 36p. 1 Litre Cider 99p. 550 Ml. Pale ale 70p. 2 Spar Toilet Rolls 43p. 24 Weetabix 59p. 450g Shreddies 75p. 440g Rice Krispies 99p. 250g Country Life Butter 53p. 170g Smarties 79p. 1 lb. Plum jam 48p. 1 lb Golden Shred Marmalade 57p. 150g Pineapple Yoghurt 27p. 750g Table Salt 30p 100g Baking Powder 27p.
